description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育官员、理学博士、教授兼博士生导师。曾任重庆大学校长、浙江大学校长及北京大学校长。
description.en: An education official of the People's Republic of China, holding a Doctor of Science degree, a professor, and a doctoral advisor. He formerly served as the President of Chongqing University, Zhejiang University, and Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Chongqing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

nodes.id: Max Planck Institute for Solid State Research

zh-cn: 马克斯—普朗克固体研究所
en: Max Planck Institute for Solid State Research

nodes.id: 北京大学化学与分子工程学院

zh-cn: 北京大学化学与分子工程学院
en: College of Chemistry and Molecular Engineering, Peking University
Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国结构工程专家，曾任重庆大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese structural engineering expert, former President of Chongqing University.

en: Zhejiang University Alumni Association in France

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，浙江大学教授，浙江中控创始人。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, professor at Zhejiang University, and founder of Supcon.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京大学校长、党委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former President and Party Secretary of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，曾任北京大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese physicist, former President of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 中国力学家，曾任浙江大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese mechanician, former President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 中国计算机科学家，曾任浙江大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese computer scientist, former President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 中国采矿工程专家，曾任重庆大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese mining engineering expert, former President of Chongqing University.

description.zh-cn: 中学毕业后，在内蒙古扎赉特旗巴达尔胡农场担任中学教员。
description.en: After graduating from middle school, he worked as a middle school teacher at Badarhu Farm in Jalaid Banner, Inner Mongolia.

degree.zh-cn: 学士学位、硕士学位、博士学位
degree.en: Bachelor's degree, Master's degree, Doctoral degree

description.zh-cn: 1978年考入北京大学化学系，并先后获得学士、硕士和博士学位。
description.en: Admitted to the Department of Chemistry at Peking University in 1978, and subsequently obtained bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees.

description.zh-cn: 1986年博士毕业后留校任教。
description.en: After graduating with a Ph.D. in 1986, he stayed at Peking University to teach.

relationships.target: Max Planck Institute for Solid State Research

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年，在德国马克斯—普朗克固体研究所从事博士后研究。
description.en: From 1988 to 1993, he conducted postdoctoral research at the Max Planck Institute for Solid State Research in Germany.

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年，在美国艾奥瓦州立大学化学系从事博士后研究。
description.en: From 1988 to 1993, he conducted postdoctoral research at the Department of Chemistry, Iowa State University, USA.

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年，在美国艾姆斯国家实验室从事博士后研究。
description.en: From 1988 to 1993, he conducted postdoctoral research at the Ames Laboratory in the USA.

relationships.target: 北京大学化学与分子工程学院

description.zh-cn: 1998年6月至2001年4月，任北京大学化学与分子工程学院院长。
description.en: From June 1998 to April 2001, he served as the Dean of the College of Chemistry and Molecular Engineering at Peking University.

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee, Executive Vice President

description.zh-cn: 2004年12月起，任北京大学党委常委、常务副校长。
description.en: Since December 2004, he has served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee and Executive Vice President of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 2010年12月至2013年6月，担任重庆大学校长。
description.en: From December 2010 to June 2013, he served as the President of Chongqing University.

description.zh-cn: 2013年6月至2015年2月，担任浙江大学校长。
description.en: From June 2013 to February 2015, he served as the President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 2015年2月15日至2018年10月23日，担任北京大学校长。
description.en: From February 15, 2015, to October 23, 2018, he served as the President of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在林建华被任命为浙江大学校长前夕，法国浙江大学校友会会长王晓杰发表联合声明，对新任校长任命表达诉求及期望，被解读为反对林建华出任。
description.en: On the eve of Lin Jianhua's appointment as President of Zhejiang University, Wang Xiaojie, president of the Zhejiang University Alumni Association in France, issued a joint statement expressing demands and expectations regarding the new president's appointment, which was interpreted as opposition to Lin Jianhua taking the post.

description.zh-cn: 正式宣布任命林建华为浙江大学校长。
description.en: Officially announced the appointment of Lin Jianhua as the President of Zhejiang University.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 决定任免林建华，使其不再担任重庆大学校长，为后续任命铺平道路。
description.en: Decided on the appointment and removal of Lin Jianhua, ending his tenure as President of Chongqing University and paving the way for his subsequent appointment.

description.zh-cn: 周绪红接替林建华担任重庆大学校长。
description.en: Zhou Xuhong succeeded Lin Jianhua as the President of Chongqing University.

description.zh-cn: 有传闻称褚健曾是抵制林建华出任浙江大学校长任命的“幕后推手”。
description.en: It was rumored that Chu Jian was the 'mastermind' behind the resistance to Lin Jianhua's appointment as President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 以涉嫌贪污罪对褚健立案侦查并将其逮捕。
description.en: Placed Chu Jian under investigation for suspected embezzlement and arrested him.

description.zh-cn: 林建华在为自己念错别字道歉时，将原因归咎于文化大革命，暗示其教育受到了影响。
description.en: When apologizing for mispronouncing a word, Lin Jianhua attributed the mistake to the Cultural Revolution, implying his education was affected.

description.zh-cn: 郝平接替林建华担任北京大学校长。
description.en: Hao Ping succeeded Lin Jianhua as the President of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 林建华接替王恩哥担任北京大学校长。
description.en: Lin Jianhua succeeded Wang Enge as the President of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 林建华接替杨卫担任浙江大学校长。
description.en: Lin Jianhua succeeded Yang Wei as the President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 吴朝晖接替林建华担任浙江大学校长。
description.en: Wu Zhaohui succeeded Lin Jianhua as the President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 林建华接替李晓红担任重庆大学校长。
description.en: Lin Jianhua succeeded Li Xiaohong as the President of Chongqing University.
